benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/block - Block an account

covered: Valid Payload: Multiple scenarios (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05) cover successful creation with required and optional fields.
Invalid Payload: Scenarios for missing body (TC09), malformed JSON (TC10), and malicious payload (TC14) are present.
Validation: AccountId format (TC07, TC13), required header (TC08), field length (TC16), and minimum values (TC17) are tested.
Large Payloads: Large BlockingState array (TC20) is tested.
Duplicate Submission: Regression scenario for duplicate BlockingState (TC23) is included.
Server Error Handling: Database unavailable (TC12), plugin service unavailable (TC22), and slow downstream (TC19) are covered.
Edge Cases: Empty pluginProperty (TC15), extra query params (TC18), and backward compatibility (TC24) are included.
Performance: High concurrency (TC25) and sustained load (TC26) are tested.
Integration: Plugin interaction (TC21, TC22) is covered.
Accessibility: Documentation and error messages (TC27) are checked.
gaps: Rate Limiting: No explicit scenario tests API rate limiting or throttling behavior.
Caching Behavior: No scenarios validate caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) in responses.
Idempotency: No scenario checks if duplicate POSTs with the same payload are idempotent or handled gracefully.
Partial Success: No scenario for partial success if part of a large payload fails.
Detailed 500 Error: No explicit scenario for generic 500 Internal Server Error (other than DB/plugin).
recommendations: Add a scenario to test API rate limiting and throttling (e.g., too many requests in a short time).
Include a scenario to check for caching headers in the response.
Test idempotency by submitting the same POST payload twice and verifying the result.
Add a scenario for partial success/failure when submitting a large array with some invalid entries.
Include a generic 500 Internal Server Error scenario not tied to DB or plugin failures.
